title: Compute a zonal task — compute_task
code: compute_task(rst, pol, pop = NULL, g_var, fn_name, db_file)

title: Compute a zonal task — compute_task
text: rst rst variable zonal tasks tibble pol pol variable zonal tasks tibble pop Optional. Population weighting raster g_var Variable name (string) unique identifies feature sf object. fn_name fn_name variable zonal tasks tibble db_file Path file name SQLite database.

title: Compute a zonal task — compute_task
text: Writes results zonal taks SQLite database return TRUE value.

title: Compute zonal tasks — compute_zonal_tasks
text: zonal_tasks tibble zonal tasks created create_zonal_tasks g_var Variable name (string) unique identifies feature sf object. db_file path file name SQLite database.

what: Create tasks of zonal statistics — create_zonal_tasks
title: Create tasks of zonal statistics — create_zonal_tasks
Create tasks of zonal statistics — create_zonal_tasks
code: create_zonal_tasks(   nc_files_list,   nc_chunk_size,   sf_geom,   sf_chunck_size,   zonal_functions,   pop = NULL )

title: Create tasks of zonal statistics — create_zonal_tasks
text: nc_files_list vector NetCDF files addresses. nc_chunk_size Chunk size raster layers processing. sf_geom sf object. sf_chunck_size Chunk size sf features processing. zonal_functions vector zonal statistics computed. pop optional. vector population raster address.

title: Create tasks of zonal statistics — create_zonal_tasks
text: tibble row zonal statistic computed using chunk raster layers chunk sf features.

title: Mozambique administrative boundaries, level 3 — gadm41_moz
text: object class sf (inherits data.frame) 413 rows 3 columns.
